tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geographic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name TEXT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    shape_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE coordinates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE shapes (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shape_name VARCHAR(255),
    shape_type VARCHAR(50),
    geometry GEOMETRY
)

CREATE TABLE mapping_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    coordinates_id INT,
    shape_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE map_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(255)
)
